definitions.definition: Any of many blends of spices used in Indian cuisine , most often containing cardamom , coriander , mace together with pepper , nutmeg , fennel seeds , jeera etc.
Any dish prepared with such spices.
examples: We ordered two lamb bhunas and a masala .

definitions.definition: Any powder of ground ingredients, not necessarily used in cuisine.

main_definition: Any of many blends of spices used in Indian cuisine , most often containing cardamom , coriander , mace together with pepper , nutmeg , fennel seeds , jeera etc.
secondary_definitions: Any dish prepared with such spices.
Any powder of ground ingredients, not necessarily used in cuisine.
